tool_description: Unofficial API to obtain recipes from GialloZafferano
name: GialloZafferano Unofficial
title: GialloZafferano Unofficial

api_list.name: getFirstCourses
api_list.description: Fetches first courses suggested by GialloZafferano

api_list.name: getSweetsAndDesserts
api_list.description: Fetches sweets and desserts suggested by GialloZafferano

api_list.name: getUniqueProducts
api_list.description:
**ONLY AVAILABLE IN ITALIAN**
Fetches unique products suggested by GialloZafferano
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://giallozafferano-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com/getUniqueProducts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "giallozafferano-unofficial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
